title: Deck of changes
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| Type | Miscellaneous item                                                                    |
| :--- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | deck of changes                                                                       |
| Icon | [![Deck of changes.png](/images/c/cf/Deck_of_changes.png)](/File:Deck_of_changes.png) |

|   |                                                                              |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A deck of magical cards which induce changes in the user or his environment. |

The **deck of changes** selects its cards from the [archetype decks](/Decks#Archetype_decks "Decks") across versions according to the following table, selecting each deck with equal probability. Since archetype decks contain varying numbers of cards, the probabilities for individual cards in the [physical deck](/Decks#Composition "Decks") are not necessarily equal.

| pre-[0.14](/0.14 "0.14")                                                                                                                  | [0.14](/0.14 "0.14")                                                                                                                      | [0.15](/0.15 "0.15")                                                                     | [0.16](/0.16 "0.16")                                                                     | [0.17](/0.17 "0.17")                                                                     | [0.18](/0.18 "0.18")                                                                     | [trunk](/Trunk "Trunk")                                                                  |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Dungeons](/Deck_of_dungeons "Deck of dungeons") [Wonders](/Deck_of_wonders "Deck of wonders") | [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Dungeons](/Deck_of_dungeons "Deck of dungeons") [Wonders](/Deck_of_wonders "Deck of wonders") | [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Wonders](/Deck_of_wonders "Deck of wonders") | [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Wonders](/Deck_of_wonders "Deck of wonders") | [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Wonders](/Deck_of_wonders "Deck of wonders") | [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Wonders](/Deck_of_wonders "Deck of wonders") | [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Wonders](/Deck_of_wonders "Deck of wonders") |

The possible cards across versions in this deck are shown in the table below.

html:
Deck of changes

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Type Miscellaneous item
Name deck of changes
Icon
A deck of magical cards which induce changes in the user or his environment.

The deck of changes selects its cards from the archetype decks across versions according to the following table, selecting each deck with equal probability. Since archetype decks contain varying numbers of cards, the probabilities for individual cards in the physical deck are not necessarily equal.

pre-0.14 0.14 0.15 0.16 0.17 0.18 trunk

Dungeons
Wonders

Wonders

Wonders

Wonders

Battle
Wonders

Battle
Wonders
